Hello, the charge for Xingfen card traffic is as follows: 1GB of national traffic in 1 yuan, and there’s no limits when reaching the demand of 3 yuan. (On the same day, the charge will be deducted directly according to 1GB of national traffic in 1 yuan, and there will be no charge if you don’t use traffic data. Why did 382MB of traffic be deducted from 1.3 yuan on the 18th? Isn't this over 1GB? How can there be a 0.3 out-of-package traffic?

Hello, this situation is mostly caused by cross-day settlement. For example, your network was not cut off before 0 o'clock on that day, and the data was not cut off until 3MB was used after 0 o'clock. Then your deduction on that day may be 1.3 yuan, but your traffic within 1G on that day after 0 o'clock is only deducted from 0.7 yuan. You can check the list for comparison.
